welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Virreyes, Argentina! Get ready to be captivated by the city's charming atmosphere, bustling streets, and rich cultural heritage. Explore and enjoy all that Virreyes has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mostly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Argentina.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
